mapper.select: select p.id as ID, p.text as TEXT, p.creator_id as CREATOR_ID, (select name from "user" where id = p.creator_id) as CREATOR_NAME, p.wall_user_id as WALL_USER_ID, wu.name as WALL_USER_NAME, c.id as CATEGORY_ID, c.text as CATEGORY_NAME from post p join post_categories c on c.id = p.post_category_id left join "user" wu on wu.id = p.wall_user_id where p.id = #{postId} and p.creator_id = #{userId}
